channel.title: [562] Change the server name to yours
channel.description:
i felt after long messing around this was very needed, if you feel like this topic should be moved then do so, this is my first tut ever and please don't flame me and yes i know most people are lazy now a days so here it is;
When ever you log in don't you notice that the game keeps saying someone Else's name for ex:
RuneSlay , the base that I'm going to show you how to edit that one; i have not figured how to change welcome to runeslay on the message box when you log in, i have searched every file possible; even client sided (Wasted my time) it took me hours just to change these simple things because all the searching i did,
okay first off i will start with client sided;
go to the client, open up folder "src" then open up file "Applet_Sub1.java" (this should be the first file there on the top)
Then press ctrl + F (that opens up the search box) Search for "RuneSlay" and replace that with what you want it to be here is a pic of what it changes;
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/t7hlqw.jpg[/img]
after that, when it loads it will say "Runeslay 562 is loading...." Here is how you change that
Go to the Client; Open up the folder "src" then open up this file; "Class184.java"
Search for "RuneSlay" and change that what you want to; i cannot take a picture now but i will upload it tomorrow.
Now for the server sided Stuff this is where the tut gets really long. I will try and shorten this as much as possible but here it goes.
1. Open up the source folder. 2. Open up folder "src". 3. Open up folder "com". 4. Open up folder "rs2hd". 5. Open up File "Main.java". 6. Search for "RuneSlay". 7. Change that to what you want. 8. Open up file Server.java 9. Search for "RuneSlay". 10. Change that to what you want. 11. Open up the folder "model" 12. Open up the file "player.java" 13. Search for "SERVER" 14. beside that there should be a message about runeslay; change that to what you want * what this does is changes the server message after you have played for so long
15. Open up folder "net" 16. open up file "ActionSender.java" 17. Search for "sup" *what this does is changes what you say when you log in.
-if you request me on how to edit the commands that where already put there to give you credits i will gladly show you
Hoped this helped Post any Questions/Comments abut this tut i will take all criticism constructively.

item.title: [562] Change the server name to yours
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

This isn’t a tutorial, it’s common knowledge.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Change the server name to yours
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

i felt after long messing around this was very needed, if you feel like this topic should be moved then do so, this is my first tut ever and please don’t flame me and yes i know most people are lazy now a days so here it is;

When ever you log in don’t you notice that the game keeps saying someone Else’s name for ex:

RuneSlay , the base that I’m going to show you how to edit that one; i have not figured how to change welcome to runeslay on the message box when you log in, i have searched every file possible; even client sided (Wasted my time) it took me hours just to change these simple things because all the searching i did,

okay first off i will start with client sided;

go to the client, open up folder “src” then open up file “Applet_Sub1.java” (this should be the first file there on the top)

Then press ctrl + F (that opens up the search box) Search for “RuneSlay” and replace that with what you want it to be here is a pic of what it changes;

t7hlqw.jpg793×563

after that, when it loads it will say “Runeslay 562 is loading…” Here is how you change that

Go to the Client; Open up the folder “src” then open up this file; “Class184.java”

Search for “RuneSlay” and change that what you want to; i cannot take a picture now but i will upload it tomorrow.

Now for the server sided Stuff this is where the tut gets really long. I will try and shorten this as much as possible but here it goes.

  1. Open up the source folder.
  2. Open up folder “src”.
  3. Open up folder “com”.
  4. Open up folder “rs2hd”.
  5. Open up File “Main.java”.
  6. Search for “RuneSlay”.
  7. Change that to what you want.
  8. Open up file Server.java
  9. Search for “RuneSlay”.
  10. Change that to what you want.
  11. Open up the folder “model”
  12. Open up the file “player.java”
  13. Search for “SERVER”
  14. beside that there should be a message about runeslay; change that to what you want
  • what this does is changes the server message after you have played for so long
  1. Open up folder “net”
  2. open up file “ActionSender.java”
  3. Search for “sup”
    *what this does is changes what you say when you log in.

-if you request me on how to edit the commands that where already put there to give you credits i will gladly show you

Hoped this helped Post any Questions/Comments abut this tut i will take all criticism constructively.

Read full topic
